オプション1:
Star Man arrived at CentOZ Church.
Searching the grounds, he found the old woman.
"When a ghost and a monster merge, a human with a red body is born."
"But it seems the red person dies in a week."

"If you know any way to prevent them from dying in a week,
please tell me."

"I see... Even if it seems unrelated,
anything you know would help."
After thanking the old woman, Star Man returned to the coastal cave.
